bee:KeyValue.description: If checked, processor will trace in debug mode
If checked, then parent / children will be linked in consolidation box

The copy meta mode option, Include means you only copy metas with names specified, Exclude mean copy all metas except the configured metas
If checked the meta will not be overwritten on processed document
